title: CURRENT EVENTS | What Really Happened
cleaned_text: Monday morning, two of the biggest names in TV — for opposite reasons — were canned or otherwise left their jobs. While Fox News’s Tucker Carlson’s and CNN’s Don Lemon’s departures from their respective networks occurred on the same day, their careers could not have been more different.
